show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Howard Glasser is not only a great guestâ€“his goal is to bring out the greatness in you! Howie applies his Nurtured Heart Approach to helping individuals, training professionals, transforming schools and even enhancing communities.
This hour with me and Howard could inspire and guide you to find a more positive approach toward everyone in your life, including yourself.
It can help you muster from within yourself the power to be a more effective and loving husband or wife, parent, teacher, therapist or friend.
Howard, along with at least two marvelous people he has trained, will be among the more than forty presenters at our upcoming Empathic Therapy Conference in Syracuse, New York, April 8-10.
Find out about the conference at www.empathictherapy.
org.
It is open to everyone!
